title: Mythicmobs插件怎么设置怪物不掉落自带物品
author: q98ew
txt_content:
比如：（鸡怪设置成不掉鸡肉、羽毛）
求大神解答！在此跪谢

replies.author: q98ew
replies.txt_content:
fanglys 发表于 2017-2-1 11:18
PreventMobKillDrops: [true/false]
还是掉落啊，鸡怪仍然掉落羽毛和生鸡肉

replies.author: fanglys
replies.txt_content: 你怎么写的，发出来看看。

replies.author: 坏笑
replies.txt_content:
Options: 
    PreventRenaming: true 
    PreventLeashing: true 
    PreventOtherDrops: true

replies.author: Icy_Mint
replies.txt_content:
生物名字:
   Health: XX
   Display: 'XX'
   XX: XX
   上面都是参考
   Options:
      PreventOtherDrops: true
   加这2行
对齐注意一下
